item.title: Personal data storage is an idea whose time has come
item.description: Data Ownership as a conversation changes when data resides primarily with people-governed institutions rather than corporations.

item.title: Americans increasingly see legal sports betting as a bad thing for society and sports
item.description: Today, 43% of U.S. adults say the fact that sports betting is now legal in much of the country is a bad thing for society, up from 34% in 2022.
item.author: (John Gramlich)

item.title: Era of AI slop cleanup has begun
item.description: From hype to hard lessons in AI engineering

item.title: The UK Is Still Trying to Backdoor Encryption for Apple Users
item.description: The Financial Times reports that the U.K. is once again demanding that Apple create a backdoor into its encrypted backup services. The only change since the last time they demanded this is that the order is allegedly limited to only apply to British users. That doesnâ€™t make it any better.The demand...
